headline.print_headline: TV Ad for Pfizer’s Painkiller Criticized by Consumer Group
headline.main: Celebrex Commercial, Long and Unconventional, Draws Criticism

docs.lead_paragraph: A consumer advocacy group has asked the F.D.A. to ban the television ad, saying it gives a false impression about its safety.
docs.snippet: A consumer advocacy group has asked the F.D.A. to ban the television ad, saying it gives a false impression about its safety.
